source.sqlReaderQuery:
select 
SKCampus,
BKCampusId,
SchoolId,
SchoolName,
DioceseId,
DioceseName,
CongregationId,
CongregationName,
IsSystemic,
CampusName,
CampusAddressStreet,
CampusAddressSuburb,
CampusAddressPostCode,
BKCampusAddressState,
CampusAddressState,
cast(CampusAddressGeoData as nvarchar),
CampusAddressLongitude,
CampusAddressLatitude,
SocioEconomicStatus,
ICSEACode,
CampusEmail,
CampusPrincipalEmail,
CampusSchoolLevelId,
CampusSchoolLevelSifCode,
CampusSchoolLevelSifDesc,
CampusSchoolSubTypeId,
CampusSchoolSubTypeDesc,
CoEdStatusId,
CoEdStatusSifDesc,
CampusFocusCode,
CampusRegion,
CampusCluster,
PrimarySort,
SecondarySort,
CreateDate,
LastUpdateDate,
EffectiveStartDate,
EffectiveEndDate,
IsCurrent,
ScdReason,
CampusSuburbAndName,
SchoolSuburbAndName,
SchoolAddressStreet,
SchoolAddressSuburb,
SchoolAddressPostCode,
SchoolAddressState,
SchoolAddressGeoData,
SchoolAddressLongitude,
SchoolAddressLatitude,
SchoolRegion,
SchoolCluster,
Website,
BoardingStatus,
Cohorts,
CoEdStatusSifCode,
CampusPhone,
SchoolPhone,
DateCampusOpened,
DateCampusClosed,
IsCampusOpen,
DateSchoolOpened,
DateSchoolClosed,
IsSchoolOpen,
CampusStateCode,
StatisticalArea1,
NameofStatisticalArea1,
StatisticalArea2,
NameofStatisticalArea2,
StatisticalArea3,
NameofStatisticalArea3,
StatisticalArea4,
NameofStatisticalArea4,
ABSRemotenessArea,
Geolocation,
SchoolURL,
AcaraSchoolId,
HeadCampusAcaraId,
SchoolSector,
CampusType,
RolledReportingDescription,
NESASchoolId,
CompassSchoolURL,
CompassSchoolName,
CompassAPIKey,
AncestryFlag,
LocationId
from dbo.vwDMCampus
